column5: The Elder Price Room is quiet, inviting space located in the Broadway Bungalow. Decorated to represent the popular musical, The Book of Mormon, the room makes say Hello! to a great trip.   The room comes with a smart TV with subscriptions to Netflix, Hulu, and Amazon Prime. and while the room is fully furnished, the EXTREMELY comfy bed is really what makes the room so special, and the media subscriptions so enticing!  Please join us at the Broadway Bungalow, and have a show-stopping trip!
